entry.title: Monday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending before morning then light snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 9:48 PM EST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:48 PM EST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 25.
